meanings.definition: Having a body temperature that varies with the temperature of the surroundings.
meanings.sent1: In the desert, the poikilothermic lizard basks in the sun to warm up.
meanings.sent2: The poikilothermic fish adjusts its body temperature by moving to different parts of the pond.
meanings.sent3: The poikilothermic frog decided to take a nap in the shade to cool down.
meanings.sent4: Her mood was as poikilothermic as a chameleon, changing with each passing moment.
meanings.sent5: The poikilothermic snake slithered across the warm rocks to regulate its temperature.

meanings.definition: An organism that regulates its body temperature based on the environment.
meanings.sent1: The poikilothermic reptile seeks out sunny spots to warm itself.
meanings.sent2: A poikilothermic creature like a turtle may move between sun and shade to control its temperature.
meanings.sent3: The poikilothermic insect found a cozy spot under a leaf to cool off.
meanings.sent4: She was a social poikilothermic, adapting her behavior to fit in with different groups.
meanings.sent5: The poikilothermic amphibian hopped into the water to lower its body temperature.
